title: Sponsored Parent (Temporary) visa
summary: This page provides detailed information about the Sponsored Parent (Temporary) visa (subclass 870), which allows parents of Australian citizens, permanent residents, and eligible New Zealand citizens to stay in Australia for 3 or 5 years. It outlines eligibility rules, costs, conditions, how to apply, sponsorship requirements, and limitations such as the inability to work or seek permanent parent visas while holding this visa.

structured_data.description: This temporary visa lets a parent of an Australian citizen, Australian permanent resident, or eligible New Zealand citizen visit Australia for up to 3 or 5 years.

stay_details.temporary_visa_note: This visa does not lead to permanent residence.

covid_concession_extension.note: The extra 18 months does not count toward the 10-year cumulative stay.

visa_end_conditions: Date specified on visa grant letter
If sponsor withdraws and no new sponsor is found

tools.visa_pricing_estimator: Does not include second instalment or other costs

processing_times.guide_tool_note: Processing times available via the visa processing time guide tool and are only an indication.

general_requirements: Must have an approved Parent Sponsor before lodging application
Must lodge within 6 months of sponsorship approval unless permission granted to apply in Australia
Must check if medical examinations or chest x-rays are required
eligibility.relationship_requirement: Must be the biological, legal (including adoptive) parent of the sponsor (content truncated before completion)

sponsorship.requirement: Applicants must have an approved Parent Sponsor.
restrictions: Sponsor cannot lodge a new sponsorship application until the current one ends

with_this_visa_you_can: Visit Australia for 3 or 5 years per visa
Re-apply for further visas up to the 10-year maximum stay
Travel to and from Australia multiple times while visa is valid

where_to_apply.exception: Permission to Apply in Australia (not in immigration clearance) may be granted in exceptional circumstances

exceptional_circumstances_examples: Accident or serious illness preventing departure (must provide medical evidence)
Natural disaster preventing return to home country
application_requirements.decision_location: Can be in or outside Australia, but not in immigration clearance

applying_for_another_visa.exception: Permission to Apply in Australia may be issued (not in immigration clearance)

90_day_rule.eligibility_requirement: Must have been outside Australia for at least 90 consecutive days since relevant departure day

relevant_departure_day_rules.if_in_australia_when_last_visa_ceased: First day you left Australia after your visa ceased
relevant_departure_day_rules.if_outside_australia_when_last_visa_ceas: Last day you left Australia while the visa was in effect

applying_for_another_visa.10_year_limit_note: If cumulative 10-year stay reached, a further Sponsored Parent (Temporary) visa cannot be granted.

travel.permission: Unlimited travel to and from Australia while visa is valid

visa_label.policy: Visa is digitally linked to passport
